about_the_game:
This exclusive demo lets you dive into the first area of the game, offering approximately one hour of immersive gameplay. Experience the beginning of our compelling story and get hands-on with the core gameplay mechanics that define the adventure ahead.

Please note: This demo is a work in progress. Some graphics and features are still under development and may not fully represent the final quality of the game.


You are alone on the universe's darkest planet, with only a rudimentary 8-bit AI to guide you. Tasked with exploring the planet’s deepest, most ominous cave systems, you must gather data and materials for scientific study. But as you delve deeper, the planet’s physical laws begin to shift, bending your perception of time, memory, and self.


A dark, experimental survival horror experience crafted by a one-person team.

Non Solar is an immersive indie survival horror game designed to plunge players into a chilling atmosphere where every corner holds potential dread. Crafted meticulously by a solo developer, this game emphasizes immersion and atmospheric horror over cheap thrills, focusing on creating an experience that stays with you. As you navigate through eerie environments and encounter mysterious entities, you'll feel a blend of vulnerability and suspense that makes survival both challenging and exhilarating..

name: Nonsolar Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 3.2GHz or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780, 3 GB | AMD Radeon R9 290X, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
